room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Very awesome, we made it out with no problems. Highly recommend for anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: This would be the perfect outing for friends, family or coworkers. The most fun we've had in a long time!! I will definitely be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Great way to spend a birthday! Great set up, great way to team build or to make you feel dumb (if you come up short of time) lol. Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: I knew within a few minutes that this wasn't my cup of tea. The casino one I had no idea how to play any of the games! I personally enjoyed the escape in nashville better.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: My wife & myself played with two other couples. We had more fun then I believe we expected.Absolutely a must try, very challenging, Faith our game master was great to work with. Looking forward to trying another room...This would be fun for teens to grandparents.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: This place is fabulous! I've had the opportunity to try two different rooms with two different "game masters" they were both a lot of fun and really engaging without making things too easy on us. This is a great experience for team building or a fun night out! Love it!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: I love escape games. We have played many of these games at different locations so of course we had to try the Breakout Nashville recently, and we had a great experience both times we went.The first time we were there we did Casino Royal. The Game Master was great. Explained everything very well and had a great attitude. The room was fun; however, I must say that I think the room is for 4 to max 6 people instead of 8. There were a couple times that some of us had to step back and didn't see what was going on because there were too many people in the room. None the less, we still enjoyed it.The 2nd room we played was the Kidnapping. That was a very fun experience. The handcuffs and the blind folds were the finishing touch and made it extra fun.Both rooms were challenging enough but not too hard.We will be there soon to play the Museum Heist and we can't wait for the Island escape to open.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Nashville in Nashville
review: Awesome family experience!!!! Two hours after breaking out and we still can't stop talking about it. Very fun and challenging - we had an absolute blast! Can't wait to come back to do the other rooms!
